de.btu.openinfra.backend.db.daos

Class TopicInstanceDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.btu.openinfra.backend.db.daos.OpenInfraDao<TypePojo,TypeModel>
      • de.btu.openinfra.backend.db.daos.OpenInfraValueDao<TopicInstancePojo,TopicInstance,TopicCharacteristic>
        • de.btu.openinfra.backend.db.daos.TopicInstanceDao

  • public class TopicInstanceDao
extends OpenInfraValueDao<TopicInstancePojo,TopicInstance,TopicCharacteristic>
    This class represents the TopicInstance and is used to access the underlying layer generated by JPA. This class is used as a view object and contains selected attribute types which should be displayed in an OpenInfRA list view. This object must not be used to insert data to the database. It is a view object only!
    Author:
    BTU DBIS

      • read

        public List<TopicInstancePojo> read(Locale locale,
                           UUID topicCharacteristicId,
                           String filter,
                           int offset,
                           int size)
        This method retrieves a list of TopicInstance objects belonging to a specified topic characteristic and where the attribute value is like the specified filter string.
        Parameters:
        locale - the required locale
        topicCharacteristicId - the id of the topic characteristic
        filter - the filter string
        offset - the number where to start
        size - the max size of the result list
        Returns:
        a list of TopicInstances

      • readWithGeomz

        public List<TopicInstancePojo> readWithGeomz(Locale locale,
                                    UUID topicCharacteristicId,
                                    int offset,
                                    int size)
        This method retrieves a list of TopicInstance objects belonging to a specified topic characteristic and where the attribute value has a 3D geometry.
        Parameters:
        locale - the required locale
        topicCharacteristicId - the id of the topic characteristic
        offset - the number where to start
        size - the size of items to provide
        Returns:
        a list of TopicInstances

      • getCountWithGeomz

        public long getCountWithGeomz(UUID topicCharacteristicId)
        This is a special count method that returns the count of Topic Characteristic objects that contains a 3D geometry.
        Parameters:
        topicCharacteristicId - the Topic Characteristic Id
        Returns:
        the count of objects

      • mapToModel

        public MappingResult<TopicInstance> mapToModel(TopicInstancePojo pojo,
                                      TopicInstance ti)
        Description copied from class: OpenInfraDao
        This is an abstract method which must be implemented by deriving classes. It should map a POJO object into a corresponding JPA model object.

        Parameters:
        pojo - the POJO object

        a corresponding JPA model object
